OOC: Perceptor IS  a Decepticon altough his name is an Autobot one, 
due he's almost blind and his beast mode is a mole, due that I 
decided named him in that way 'cause he percive what's around.

Perceptor::

"ENOGUH!!!!"snarled the male "A NAME IT'S JUST A NAME, in spite of 
my name I'M ONE OF THE first Decepticons that Quitessons have made 
and HYDRAS KNOWS WHO TRULY I'M... And YOU MAXIMA... YOU'RE ONE WHO 
HAS MORE BENEFITS OF HYDRAS AND YA KNOW WHAT I MEAN and you haven't 
to be worried about you life as every one of US... HE JUST LIKE 
TRICKER US TO BETRAY THE LOYALTY THAT WE OWE HIDRAS AS MEGATRON AND 
GALVATRON!!! TO SERVE AT WHOM!!!!! A BAD COPY THAT APPEARS NO BODY 
WHERE AND WITH NO KNOW INTENTION?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> The clone looked down on Perceptor with a sneer.  He then laughed 
out loud at the treacherous robot.
> "You are no Decepticon.  My Matrix tells me differant.  You are a 
treacherous Autobot, just like that sniveling Starscream, full of 
treason and schemes.  Go back to your hole in the wall, I have no 
need to hear you rant on the identity of Hydras."
> Megatron Revived then turned and looked at Maxima.  A curiosity, 
she could be a great leader.  He could use someone like her back in 
the Fleet.
> "Hydras is a throwback.  A mistake.  He is a combination of 
Quintesson programming and Unicron's lunacy.  He is no leader.  I'll 
even go as far as to say he doesn't even have a Matrix Chamber."
> He smirked and brought a hand to the center of his chest, where a 
highly stylized purple insignia resided.
> "True Cybertronian Leaders are more capable than he.  Why do you 
stay with him?  Do you like living in fear, fear he will one day 
destroy you with out a single thought?  He can do that, he is more 
than capable to do so." 
> 
> MaximaSR74@a... wrote:
> Watching the Megatron clone with her crimson gaze, cool & 
calculated... 
> 
> Then shot a glare at Perceptor. He didn't seem to assist the 
situation any. An animal growl towards him, "Watch your metallic 
tongue, Perceptor. Or you will soon enough find it missing!" 
> 
> Then returning her fiery crimson optics back upon the 
Clone. "Forgive him. He is alike the others. Predacons know little 
of old Decepticon discipline." 
> 
> Looking him over as she walked towards him... "You claim to be 
Megatron.. yet," then started to circle around him in a feline 
manner, "you claim you are not."
> 
> Come back around to the front to face him. "Confusion will not 
work," smirking with a purr, placing her long claw hand units upon 
her hips as the wings flexed a moment. 
>
